name: Santuário
description:
Game made for my graduation project in Product Design

Sanctuary is a game about overcoming anxiety and depression. Thinking of ways to represent the overcoming of a crisis, the focus of the game is to demonstrate that taking care of yourself and getting back on your feet is possible. 

The main intent of the game is to represent the transition from mental health through lighting and ambiance. 

The game is about a sanctuary that is destroyed and neglected and the player must complete puzzles to progress and take care of it as if it was his mind.
